name: Wpazure Kit
author: wpazure

sections.description:
This plugin is the for Wpazure themes. Extend your theme functionality with Wpazure Kit with various modules.

Features:
– Banner
– Services
– Project
– Testimonials
– CTA
– Blog
– Set home page
